summary: Lieutenant Cho, a cop on the edge, is mourning the recent death of his mother, while under investigation for graft. On top of that, he is suddenly put in charge of a seemingly impenetrable mystery.
cast: Suk-kyu Han|Eun-ha Shim|Hang-Seon Jang|Jung-ah Yum|Ahn Suk-hwan|Cheol-Ho Park|Joon-Sang Yoo|Hwan-Jun Lee|Nam-hee Kwon
title: Telmisseomding
